Package Game.GraphicObjects.Table

Class WindowTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.GraphicObjects.GraphicWindow
      • Game.GraphicObjects.Table.WindowTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphicComponents
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckersTable
    public abstract class WindowTable
extends GraphicWindow

    WindowTable class

    This class abstracts the concept of the game window.
